entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:01 a.m. PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12 except temperature steady near plus 1 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Wet snow near the Rockies. Snowfall amount 10 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 12 except temperature steady near plus 1 over southern sections. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 17 April 2023
